task.title: How to Subtract Numbers
task.shortdesc: This is a help topic that describes how to subtract two numbers using Windows' Calculator app.

taskbody.prereq: You should have the basic arithmatic knowledge about subtraction. Also, you should know how to open the Calculator app in Windows.

step.cmd: Open the Calculator app in your Windows machine.
step.info: The Standard verison of the Calculator app will be sufficient for this procedure. You do not need the Scientific verstion.

step.cmd: Enter the first number or minuend.
step.info: You may either key in the number directly or click the relevant number buttons on the Calculator app.

step.cmd: Click the Minus button on the Calculator app. Alternatively, you may click the Minus Key on your keyboard.
Enter the second number or subtrahend.
step.info: You may either key in the number directly or click the relevant number buttons on the Calculator app.

step.cmd: Click the Equal button on the app. Alternatively, you may press the Equal key on your keyboard.

taskbody.result: The difference between the minuend and subtrahend is displayed in the display area of the Calculator.
